sense.name: record in detail
sense.examples: The parents documented every step of their child's development. Please help me document the history of social network sites by adding key dates to this timeline. They documented the purchase of an Australian sheep which was then trussed.

sense.name: support with references or evidence
sense.examples: Can you document your claims? Table 12.2 contain a range of simulations which document the assertions in proposition 2.
